contexts.context: ...but work on it for a year. My "summer" <mark>trip</mark> to England got postponed to November while I revised...
...there" said the voice, "We make a special <mark>trip</mark> for the Herr Professor." Startled, I exclaimed...
...south, although we may put off the southern <mark>trip</mark> for another year or so. I haven't been across...
